tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Treatment for bleeding/ Swolen Gums,Broken Teeth,
review:
I was having problems with three of my teeth when I visited Dr Poorvi I was little anxious and worried as I was not going to my regular dentist and the covid fear was also there 

She was so patient and nice that my anxiety was over only by talking to her 
At her clinic all the covid protocols are followed perfectly ,For my age and since I am co morbid she made sure that she called me always as a first patient 

As for my treatment she gave me all the right advise and never tried to misguide me ,even the other visiting doctors are very gentle and well versed
I am so glad that I found her she solved everything properly ,she is very will versed with her profession ,she  doesn't over charge ,she also gave me all the advise to avoid further complications and assured me that she is always available on phone call if I need her 

Very gentle *** **** **** ****** also 

Her assistant also is polite and helpful 

I would suggest her to everyone I know
reply_text: Thank you so much for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review:
I visited Dr. Poorvi for second time for tooth related ailment. My experience with her has been very good both times. I visited her for a cavity filling a couple of years back and for RCT recently. She knows her craft. She is so good that treatment like RCT was not painful at all. She provides realistic options as well as advice. I was quite scared to visit a clinic due to ongoing pandemic, however, enough precautions are being taken at the clinic to ensure that infection is not spread. 
Would highly recommend her !!
reply_text: thank you for your kind words

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
In the time of a pandemic when most of the doctors in my area were unavailable I contacted Dr. Poorvi who consulted me on the phone before giving me an appt to visit her clinic. We were thoroughly sanitised and temperature checked in the premises before the visit.
Dr. Poorvi, very patiently heard me out and spelt out the possible causes and diagnosis and the treatment. She was very friendly and patient during the whole consultation. 
Even after the visit she has made herself available on phone for further doubts and questions and even proactively follows up with me for updates on improvement. 
I am glad I chose to get myself checked up by Ms. Poorvi. A very professional and sincere doctor whom I wouldn't hesitate to refer and recommend to a friend.
reply_text: Thank you Aishwarya for your kind words üôèüèª
